author: iSazonov
body:
We need tests for PowerShell Regex API in WildcardPattern class.

Perhaps MSFT team can port Unit tests
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/0d55a7249b7a4188b18dab89c004d7be3eae7d7e/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/regex.cs#L722

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @kvprasoon I added tests only for two methods. I think we could add more tests.

title: Need tests for Regex
